item.title: Yvan Gauthier
item.description: About Me I am senior data scientist with the National Research Council Digital Technologies. As part of the NRCâ€™s Data Analytics Centre, I lead initiatives aiming to accelerate the adoption of data analytics and AI in the public service. Before, I worked with the Centre for Operational Research and Analysis of Defence Research and Development Canada, where I became the first-ever Director of Data Science in the Department of National Defence (DND) and built a data science team supporting the Chief Data Officer and Assistant Deputy Minister (Data, Innovation, Analytics).
